oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thos. W. Ward Account Ledger
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thomas William Ward
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Historical Accounts - Business Accounts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Accounts of Thos W. Ward Ltd from June 1934. Thos. W. Ward Ltd was a Sheffield, Yorkshire steel, engineering and cement business which began as coal and coke merchants then expanded to recycling metal for Sheffield's steel industry, engineering and the supply of machinery.
